name: coolingTemperature_increase
description: This function is used to increase the cooling temperature set on a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase the cooling temperature.

parameters.name: coolingTemperatureDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to increase the cooling temperature.
